meanings.definition: To give a new title to something.
meanings.sent1: I will retitle the book to make it more interesting.
meanings.sent2: She decided to retitle the painting before the exhibition.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to retitle its toy mouse as 'Mr. Squeaky'.
meanings.sent4: The author had to retitle his novel to capture the essence of the story.
meanings.sent5: Let's retitle the project for a fresh perspective.

meanings.definition: To change the title of something.
meanings.sent1: They will retitle the movie to attract more viewers.
meanings.sent2: The magazine editor had to retitle the article for clarity.
meanings.sent3: The students decided to retitle their group project at the last minute.
meanings.sent4: The museum had to retitle the exhibit due to a copyright issue.
meanings.sent5: It's important to retitle the document to reflect its content accurately.
